Title: Relates to the sale of tobacco products over the internet
Summary: Relates to the sale of tobacco products over the internet; requires companies selling tobacco products over the internet to first send a form to individuals to sign stating that such individual is eighteen years of age or older and upon receipt of such form, the company may send the tobacco products if such person is over the requisite age.
LawCode: Add ยง1399-dd-1, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the sale of tobacco products over the internet
